Mountain King064368d6jiu7j4mnrujv01g4zxba15kkusyn1494222014-06-27T16:51:41ZGreater good3347453/* See also */'''Mountain King''' was a title held by the [[First Men]] rulers of the [[Kingdom of the Mountain and the Vale]] until the [[Andal]] [[Andal Invasion|invasion]] of [[Westeros]]. The last of the Mountain Kings was the [[Griffin King]], who was defeated by the "Winged Knight", Ser [[Artys Arryn]]. Afterward, [[House Arryn]] replaced the line of the Mountain Kings as the rulers of the [[Vale]].

The Mountain Kings were responsible for the construction of the [[Eyrie]], seat of the rulers of the Vale since the [[Age of Heroes]].
